summary: Project involves a form-based UI with door entry and customer details sections.

existing_features.title: In the main door entry view (the 'form' screen in App.tsx), display a read-only customer details section above the DoorEntryForm component, showing the collected customer name and mobile number from state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add customer details section above new door entry

projectName: Display customer details above new door entry form
